headline.main: Deadly Floods Hit Southern Zimbabwe, Destroying Many Homes
headline.print_headline: Deadly Floods Hit Southern Zimbabwe, Destroying Many Homes

lead_paragraph: From kitchen items to livestock and even her house, Assa Mkwananzi says she has "lost it all" to floods that have hit southern Zimbabwe.
snippet: From kitchen items to livestock and even her house, Assa Mkwananzi says she has "lost it all" to floods that have hit southern Zimbabwe....
